req1: A task property GUI class provides interface and functions to add and remove dependencies by using an object of the dependency collection.
req2: A GUI provides interface and functions to edit the properties of objects of the human resource class.

req1: When a resource is removed, all the tasks where the resource is assigned need to be updated.
req2: When two or more tasks are link, there should be check conducted for potential collisions on the chart.
